readable.title: 2089539651_9e518ec7de
readable.content: A hiker with two hiking poles stands on a hillside with a view of the city below him . A hiker with two sticks is a standing on a path that is high up on a hill . A hiking man stands on a cliff overlooking a city . A man hikes on a dirt path high above a city . A person holding poles is standing on a rock ledge with bushes on each side overlooking mountains .
